TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMultiTargetingSupportService

summary.span: Fornece vários destinos para os hosts do Designer de Fluxo de Trabalho do Windows.

span.span: Provides multi-targeting for Windows Workflow Designer hosts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *Multiplataforma* é a capacidade de localizar a versão correta do assembly carregado que corresponde ao destino [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versão do projeto atual do fluxo de trabalho em [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].*Multi-targeting* is the ability to find the right version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version of the current workflow project in [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)]. Essa interface é implementada e usado internamente pelo [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] componentes do designer para resolver [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies de vários destinos com reconhecimento de forma dentro de [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hospedando o aplicativo.This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components to resolve [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies in a multi-targeting aware fashion within the [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hosting application. O [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] componentes designer usam a implementação dessa interface somente quando assemblies adicionais precisam ser carregados dinamicamente para a edição `AppDomain`.The [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components use the implementation of this interface only when additional assemblies need to be loaded dynamically into the editing `AppDomain`.

Public Function GetReflectionAssembly (targetAssemblyName As AssemblyName) As Assembly

summary.span: Retorna o assembly carregado no momento, considerando o nome do assembly.

span.span: Returns the currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.

returns.span: O assembly carregado no momento, considerando o nome do assembly.

span.span: The currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
